arcade.patch.sim

Class PatchSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.engine.SimState
      • arcade.patch.sim.PatchSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulation, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchSimulationHex, PatchSimulationRect

    public abstract class PatchSimulation
extends sim.engine.SimState
implements Simulation
    Abstract implementation for patch Simulation instances.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • scheduleActions

        public final void scheduleActions()
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Schedules any Action instances.

        The concrete implementing class calls this and other schedule methods from the MASON library start() method, which is called before the schedule starts stepping the simulation.

        Specified by:
        scheduleActions in interface Simulation
